name: The King is Dead (Capitals)
description: "The glorious king of Voxelnor has been assasinated. King Cubelet was poisoned in the walled gardens. You, as the late king's only son, should be able to seize the throne on your arrival. No! Your Uncle, Cubius, has seized the throne and is sending an army to capture you. Use what you have learnt in your studies abroad to build up your own army and sieze the palace for yourself."
